title: 820-4924 No Backlight
message:
This is an interesiting Case:

I2C lines are fine
feedback is fine
sense cuircuit had broken traces (to the shunt resistor)
made those connections again
the screen is working. I tested it
on the backlight output i have 11.7V
i have found out that if i measure r7702 on pin 2 (with a multimeter) the backlight starts working. So i changed R7702. But still the same issue.
I have also changed the following parts: u7700, D7710, Q7701, R7701, C7700, Q7700

i am a little lost. What could be the issue here.

title: 820-4924 No Backlight
message: Broken trace from U7700 to R7702?

title: 820-4924 No Backlight
message:
Replace all resistors around U7700.
Re-check all solders and traces.
